visits.text: Route Nairobi → Amboseli NP (view of Kilimanjaro weather permitting).
Amboseli tracks: large elephant herds, swamps and plains.
Route Nairobi → Amboseli NP (vue sur le Kilimandjaro selon météo).
Pistes d’Amboseli : grandes hardes d’éléphants, marais et plaines.

activities.text: Observation loop at sunset near the Enkongo Narok swamps.
Boucle observation au coucher du soleil près des marais d’Enkongo Narok.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Hell's Gate National Park: volcanic landscapes, gorges and viewpoints.
Wildlife observation without major predators (zebras, giraffes, elands, baboons).
Hell’s Gate National Park : paysages volcaniques, gorges et points de vue.
Observation faune sans prédateurs majeurs (zèbres, girafes, élands, babouins).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Scenic route Kitale → Iten (Kerio escarpment, viewpoints).
Route panoramique Kitale → Iten (escarpement de Kerio, points de vue).

activities.text: Short walk on Rift Valley viewpoints (stable weather).
Courte marche sur les belvédères de la vallée du Rift (météo stable).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route from Hell's Gate to Kisumu (Lake Victoria) via Naivasha and Kericho.
Lakeside walk and hippopotamus observation points at dawn/dusk.
Promenade au bord du lac et points d’observation de l’hippopotame à l’aube/au crépuscule.

activities.text: Sunset over Lake Victoria from the public pier.
Coucher de soleil sur le Lac Victoria depuis la jetée publique.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Exit Uganda through northern border posts and descent to Kitale (Kenya).
Sortie d’Ouganda par les postes du nord et descente vers Kitale (Kenya).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Nairobi: vehicle preparation, cash withdrawal and shopping in the city center.
Return to Nairobi
Nairobi : préparation du véhicule, retrait d’espèces et courses dans le centre-ville.
Retour vers Nairobi

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS
EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Iten → Aberdare foothills (Nyeri sector) via small roads.
Crossing agro-forestry zones and viewpoints of Mount Kenya (distant).
Iten → contreforts de l’Aberdare (secteur Nyeri) par petites routes.
Traversée de zones agro-forestières et points de vue sur le Mont Kenya (distant).

activities.text: Twilight wildlife observation at ranches/private reserves (on the edge).
Observation crépusculaire de faune de ranchs/réserves privées (en bordure).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Ol Pejeta Conservancy: high wildlife density (Big Five, rhinoceros).
Ol Pejeta Conservancy : forte densité de faune (Big Five, rhinocéros).

activities.text: Central safari route and grassy areas near water points.
Safari route centrale et zones herbeuses proches des points d’eau.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route vers Samburu National Reserve (sections de piste et tarmac).
Boucles d’observation : gerenuk, zèbre de Grévy, oryx, éléphants.

activities.text: Slow route via wildlife corridors (Borana/Lewa transit authorized)
Itinéraire lent via couloirs fauniques (Borana/Lewa transit autorisé)

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route to Gisenyi (Lake Kivu): lakeside corniche and black sand beaches.
Route vers Gisenyi (Lac Kivu) : corniche lacustre et plages de sable noir.

activities.text: Walk along the lake promenade and observation of fishing pirogues.
Balade sur la promenade du lac et observation des pirogues de pêche.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route Nyungwe → Kigali through the Rwandan hills.
Kigali Genocide Memorial (silent visit and museography).
Route Nyungwe → Kigali par les collines rwandaises.
Mémorial du Génocide de Kigali (visite silencieuse et muséographie).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Scenic route to Nyungwe National Park (mountain forest).
Visitor center: information on chimpanzee trekking and canopy walk.
Route panoramique vers Nyungwe National Park (forêt de montagne).
Centre visiteurs : infos sur trekking chimpanzés et canopy walk.

activities.text: Option: Nyungwe Canopy Walk (suspended walkways).
Option : Canopy Walk de Nyungwe (passerelles suspendues).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Volcanoes National Park visitor center: brief hikes and permits.
Mount Bisoke ascent: volcanic trail, bamboo forest and crater (full day).
Centre d’accueil de Volcanoes National Park : brief randonnées et permis.
Ascension du Mont Bisoke : sentier volcanique, forêt de bambous et cratère (journée).

activities.text: Golden monkey or gorilla trek reservation (depending on available permits).
Wildlife observation at altitude (mountain weather conditions).
Réservation trek singes dorés ou gorilles (selon permis disponibles).
Observation naturaliste en altitude (conditions météo de montagne).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS
EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS
EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Gatuna/Katuna border (RW → UG), ascent to Bwindi Impenetrable Forest.
Frontière Gatuna/Katuna (RW → UG), montée vers la forêt impénétrable de Bwindi.

activities.text: Gorilla trek (if permit scheduled for another day) and trail reconnaissance.
trek gorilles (si permis prévu un autre jour) et repérage sentiers.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route Jinja → Entebbe via Kampala (dense urban traffic).
Shore of Lake Victoria at Entebbe: walk and bird observation points.
Route Jinja → Entebbe par Kampala (trafic urbain dense).
Bord du lac Victoria à Entebbe : promenade et points d’observation d’oiseaux.

activities.text: Organization of a canoe trip
Organisation d’une sortie pirogue

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Jinja: sources of the Nile and colonial city center.

activities.text: Walk along the Nile banks (bridge/shores) and scouting water activities.
Balade en rive du Nil (pont/berges) et repérage activités nautiques.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Northeast route to Kidepo Valley NP (isolated section, semi-desert landscapes).
Route nord-est vers Kidepo Valley NP (portion isolée, paysages semi-désertiques).

activities.text: Sunset safari in Narus valley (savanna wildlife).
Safari au coucher du soleil dans la vallée de Narus (faune de savane).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route to Lake Bunyonyi, terraced landscapes and volcanic islands.
Viewpoints over the lake and surrounding villages.
Route vers Lake Bunyonyi, paysages en terrasses et îles volcaniques.
Points de vue sur le lac et villages environnants.

activities.text: Traditional canoe ride on the lake (calm conditions).
Balade en canot traditionnel sur le lac (conditions calmes).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route to Lake Mburo National Park, hills and wooded savannas.
Lake Mburo tracks: zebras, topis, impalas, buffaloes.
Route vers Lake Mburo National Park, collines et savanes boisées.
Pistes de Lake Mburo : zèbres, topis, impalas, buffles.

activities.text: Late afternoon safari on the loops near the marshes.
Safari en fin d’après-midi sur les boucles proches des marais.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Mabamba Swamp: wetland renowned for the shoebill.
Mabamba Swamp : zone humide réputée pour le bec-en-sabot (shoebill).

activities.text: Canoe trip with ornithological trackers (sunrise recommended).
Sortie en pirogue avec pisteurs ornithologiques (lever de soleil recommandé).

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Long stage to Murchison Falls NP via Fort Portal/Hoima (mixed roads).
Point de vue sur les chutes (Upper/Top of the Falls).
Longue étape vers Murchison Falls NP via Fort Portal/Hoima (routes mixtes).
Viewpoint of the falls (Upper/Top of the Falls).

activities.text: Cruise/observation on Victoria Nile optional depending on schedule.
Croisière/observation sur le Nil Victoria en option selon horaires.

days_plan.itin_title: EAST AFRICA ROAD TRIP: NAIROBI → ARUSHA VIA LAKES, VOLCANOES AND SAFARIS

visits.text: Route Bwindi → Queen Elizabeth NP: craters and savannas.
Mweya Peninsula: viewpoints over Kazinga Channel.
Route Bwindi → Queen Elizabeth NP : cratères et savanes.
Péninsule de Mweya : points de vue sur le canal de Kazinga.

activities.text: Late afternoon safari (northern tracks): elephants, lions, hippos.
Safari en fin de journée (pistes nord) : éléphants, lions, hippopotames.
